## ChampionMasteryManager.refreshAll() method

Update the cache with the latest data for all champions' mastery data for this summoner.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
refreshAll(): Promise<Collection<string, ChampionMastery>>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;Collection&lt;string, [ChampionMastery](./shieldbow.championmastery.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;
